'''Let the Wind Lead''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to obtain the power of {{Anemo}} at a [[Statue of The Seven]] for the first time, which is done during the quest ''[[Bird's Eye View]].''
